segments.text: I am calling to ask about the position of an usher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything you would like to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What qualities do you expect the applicants to have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We expect the usher girl to be good-looking , no less than 165 centimeters high , and love smiling .
segments.speaker: S2
